title: Renato Leripio
text:
About
I’m currently a Senior Analyst at Kapitalo Investimentos, in charge of developing tools to improve the accuracy of economic forecasts. I’m also the author of R for Economic Research, my first book in which I teach indispensable tools to produce professional economic analyzes using R language.



Education
Graduation Cap MS in Economics, 2017

Graduation Cap BS in Economics, 2013


Universidade Federal Fluminense, Brazil




Experience
 Senior Economic Analyst, 2022-present


Kapitalo Investimentos

 Quantitative Researcher, 2019-2022


Itau Asset Management

 Economic Research Analyst, 2017-2019


Institute of Research and Statistics of the Federal District
